thread.title: Stacey Barnes

author: Stacey Barnes
title: Stacey Barnes
text: Today was the day I finally found my favorite pair of shoes that I have been searching to find for years! I seen these boots in a store in the mall but I was a little too young to get them but I promised myself I would get them if the store still had them when I turned 18. Sadly to say the store closed down and I was never able to find those boots again until now! For one your boots where priced so much cheaper than the store in the mall, $45 for a super cute pair of boots I've been searching for a years that costed around 3 times as much in the mall! Yeah how could i pass that up! But to make it even better they where priced 55% off! $15 for a pair of boots (not just any kind of boots mind you) that no matter where I went I could not find them anywhere! Talk about a great way to get introduced to not only a great website for shoes but clothes and much more! Your checkout was super simple and fast. Thank yall for making my Valentines Day a bit sweeter!
